page.title: 16OLD ROSSINGTON _ FAMILY LIFE
page.content: A small survey was carried out to find out about family life. We asked people a variety of questions to find out amongst other things _ why they live in Rossington, what are the main occupations, children's activities and shopping habits. Most people questioned were not born in Rossington, but live here as they like the area. They have lived here for under 15 years, owning their own homes and are all professional. Before school age all children attended play and nursery school. As they got older many children went to swimming club. The majority of women shop at Gateways supermarket and also the open market on Friday, some shop in Doncaster. We discovered the most useful thing in the home was the washing machine. The motor car was the most useful machine outside.
